message.body:
First off I want to apologize again. If I need to spray the whole house I will. Part of the issue would be getting everyone to bag & wash everything. But if it needs to get done it needs to get done.
This is one of the many reasons I wish Beth was handling this job. Did you get a chance to call her?

No one had ever had an issue with bed bugs in your room before you moved in. But no one was living in your room when this problem first occurred. The girl who had been living there had already moved in with her boyfriend a couple months before. Then Kaushal basically used it as storage while waiting for Oliver to move.

Only David & Phillip had an issue & I thought the problem was addressed & done with. We only sprayed your room as a precaution. No one told me anything about not putting stuff against the walls or using the closet.
And this is in no way blaming you - but if I had known about your getting bites right when you moved in I think we could have jumped on this issue earlier before it got out of control.
It is possible that a few of the other rooms have bedbugs but it is unlikely. I have sent out several texts to everyone in the house in the last month or so.

On August 14th I sent this text to everyone in the house -- "Have you noticed any bed bugs or any bug bites? Ingrid thinks she may have them. I'm waiting on a call back from the exterminator." I sent a couple follow up texts also.
Oh ok
Yeah it's just annoying to do my room again and feel like it's a bit futile if everyone isn't doing it but I guess we will see
I'm very sorry this experience has left you in Feeling like you want to cry. I feel you. If I was a crier I would have been bawling for weeks. This whole thing has me pulling my hair out.

I have to run to work but I can call Beth in the morning. Again I will do whatever it takes to get rid of this little fuckers. And Thank you again for our understand thru what has to be a horrible experience.

I suspect if Beth was around she would have made you wash / bag everything before she treated the first time & all the bed bugs would have been dead 2 weeks ago.
I have to go to work now but I'll call Beth tomorrow morning.
:) I meant thinking of moving would make me cry bc moving sucks so I obv don't want to do it
I wasn't saying I'm crying now :)
Ok!
Sounds good
I know but I do feel like crying right now!! Or punching a wall. But the last time I punched a wall I shattered my hand so I know it is a bad idea:-/
Well I actually punched an oak staircase. Either way it's a bad idea. Just feeling Arrrrrgggghhh!!! right now.......
Lol don't punch things! Haha
I won't I learned my lesson the hard way. I never was a big wall puncher but I was very very mad at that moment.
I actually had the presence of mind to punch the stairs instead of the wall b/c I knew I'd have to fix the wall.
Haha Spoken like a true landlord/property owner!
I bet I can make you miss Philly
I'm at dirty franks w my last drop coworkers
ï¿¼
If I didn't have to go to work I'd go on an absolute ass kicking run.
Awwww. I miss Franks & the Last Drop!!!
Is it still the same bartenders? The two girls & the guy who have been there FOREVER?? Trying to remember their names.
Lol yes!!
Heather is serving
She's in her forties or something and much hotter than me lol
Yeah she is awesome! I doubt she'd remember me but tell her I said Aloha!!
Haha ok
